original_title: 羞恥　新入生発育健康診断２０１５春
overview: That season has come again ... a season of shame. Anthropometry performed in cooperation with the prefecture and a university hospital.  Specialized examinations are also performed from general ones such as medical measurement, electrocardiogram, venereal disease / breast cancer.  All are mixed gender, and the results are stored and used as research data.  Includes 5 SEX people who are mischievous by doctors and students and can spread young cracks.
title: Shame – Adolescent Freshmen's Physical Exams, Spring 2015
